entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 9.
